Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-37891 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 1.26.19-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-37891 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 1.26.19-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-urllib3 is earlier than 1.26.19-1, affected by CVE-2024-37891
